articles.title: Queen missed 'golden moment' with Covid vaccine as expert notices 'something odd' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE ROYAL FAMILY is said to have 'missed an opportunity' over the announcement that the Queen and Prince Philip had received Covid vaccinations, as a royal expert has noticed 'something odd'.

articles.author: Paige Holland, James Brinsford
articles.title: Sex And The City fans' savage jibe as reboot gets green light without Kim Cattrall - Mirror Online
articles.description: Sex And The City fans are disappointed to say the least that Kim Cattrall isn't returning to their screens for the new series - but Sarah Jessica Parker revealed why on Instagram
articles.content:
Sex And The City is coming back for another series - but without Kim Cattrall.
Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon and Kristin Davis will star in the new TV series, titled And Just Like That.
But f… [+2162 chars]
